Property.name: code
Property.Description: document name ( with extension ) for example: package.class.CLS

Method.name: codeSet
Method.Implementation: s i%code = code s i%name = ..nameExtract( code ) s i%ext = ..extExtract( code ) Q 1

Method.name: fileTS
Method.Implementation: Quit:'##class(%File).Exists(file) "" Quit $zdt( ##class(%File).GetFileDateModified( file ), 3 )

Method.name: codeTS
Method.Implementation: Q ..ts( ..code ) ;remove ms

Method.name: ts
Method.Implementation: Q $p( ##class(%RoutineMgr).TS( class ), "." ) ;remove ms

Method.name: extExtract
Method.Implementation: Q $p( code, ".", $l( code, "." ) )

Method.name: on
Method.Description: Read settings and run event handlers

Method.name: handle
Method.Implementation:
s printer = ##class(sc.printer).new()
d printer.trace( ..event_"( "_..code _ " )" )
Q:..ignore() 1
s filename = ..filename()
if ..event = "afterdelete" { s sc = ..fileDelete( filename ) d printer.w( "Delete " _ filename, sc ) Q sc }
#;ts - timeStamp s codeTS = ..codeTS() d printer.trace( "codeTS: " _ codeTS )
#; change events - beforeload, aftersave, aftercompile s fileTS = ..fileTS( filename ) d printer.trace( "fileTS: " _ fileTS _" ( " _ filename _ " ) " )
if ( codeTS = fileTS ) Q 1 ;nothing to sync
if ( codeTS ] fileTS ) { ;export
s sc = ..export( filename ) d printer.w( ..code _" -> " _ filename, sc ) Q sc
}
if (( fileTS ] codeTS ) && ( ..event '= "aftercompile" )) { ;import
s sc = ..import( filename ) ; file newer - import from file d printer.w( filename _" -> " _ ..code, sc ) Q sc
}
Q $$$OK

Method.name: workdir
Method.Implementation: Q ##class(sc.options).workdir()

Method.name: fileDelete
Method.Implementation: Q ##class(%File).Delete( file )

Method.name: filename
Method.Description: convert code name to file name, packages translate as directories
Method.Implementation:
s name = ..name s namelen = $l( name, "." ) s hasPackage = ( namelen > 1 ) s ext = ..ext
s dir = ..workdir(), path = "" s dm = "\" ; $$$IsWINDOWS d[eli]m[eter] #define dm( %dir ) $s( $e( %dir, $l( %dir ) ) = dm: "", 1: dm )
if ( hasPackage ) { ;myPackage.myClass.CLS
s packages = $p( name, ".", 1, namelen - 1 ) ; for example: myPackage.myClass
s path = $tr( packages, ".", dm ) ; for example: myPackage/myClass
s:packages'="" dir = dir _ $$$dm(dir) _ path
s name = $p( name, ".", namelen )
}
s sc = ##class(%File).CreateDirectoryChain( dir ) ;need for (%File).NormalizeFilename s file = name _ "."_ ext _ ".xml" Q dir _ $$$dm(dir) _ file

Method.name: filemask
Method.Implementation: Q "*.CLS.xml"

Method.name: ignore
Method.Implementation: Q:$e(..code)="%" 1 ;ignore system classes Q:$e(..code, 1, $l("INFORMATION"))="INFORMATION" 1 ;SQL-standart classes Q:##class(sc.legacy).codeIsGenerated(..code) 1 ;ignore generated code Q 0

Method.name: export
Method.Implementation: Q ##class(sc.legacy).classExport( ..code, filename )

Method.name: import
Method.Implementation: s sc = $system.OBJ.Load( filename, flags, .err, .list ) s:sc ..code = list Q sc

Method.name: exportAll
Method.Implementation:
s printer = ##class(sc.printer).new()
s handler = ..%New(), handler.event = "exportAll"
s rs = ..List(.sc) Q:'sc sc
s result = 1
while rs.Next() {
s handler.code = $g( rs.Data( "Name" ) ) ; <- this line differ from sc.classes:exportAll
if handler.ignore() continue
s sc = handler.export()
d printer.w( handler.code _ " -> " _ handler.filename(), sc )
d ##class(%SYSTEM.Status).AppendStatus( result, sc )
}
d rs.Close()
Q result

Method.name: List
Method.Description: Return resultset with all available documents
Method.Implementation: s rs = ##class(%ResultSet).%New("%Dictionary.ClassDefinition:Summary") s sc = rs.Execute() Q rs

Method.name: importAll
Method.Implementation:
s workdir = ##class(sc.options).workdir()
s mask = ..filemask()
s sc = ..importDir( workdir, mask, .loaded )
JOB ^sc.compile(loaded)
Q sc

Method.name: importDir
Method.Description: Cach√© v.5.0 can't reimport class if exist opened object

Property.name: code
Property.Description: document name ( with extension ) for example: package.class.CLS

Method.name: codeSet
Method.Implementation: s sc = ##super(code) s sc = sc && ..getData( code, .data ) if ( sc ) { s i%id = $g(data("id")) s i%fullName = $g(data("fullName")) } Q 1

Method.name: getData
Method.Implementation: s sql = "Select ID, fullName From %DeepSee_UserLibrary.FolderItem Where documentName = ?" s rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect( , sql, code ) s ( id, fullName ) = "" if ( rs.%Next() ) { s data("id") = rs.ID s data("fullName") = rs.fullName } Q 1

Method.name: filemask
Method.Implementation: Q "*.DFI.xml"

Method.name: ignore
Method.Implementation: Q 0

Method.name: export
Method.Implementation: Q ..dfiExport( ..fullName, filename, 0 )

Method.name: dfiExport
Method.Implementation: Q ##class(%DeepSee.UserLibrary.Utils).%Export( fullName, filename, 0 )

Method.name: import
Method.Implementation:
s loaded = "", sc = ..load( filename, .loaded ) s:sc ..code = loaded( 1 ) _ ".DFI"
Q sc

Method.name: load
Method.Implementation: #; .%Import( replace = 1, verbose = 0, killAll = 0, forceName = "", .loaded = "" ) Q ##class(%DeepSee.UserLibrary.Utils).%Import( filename, 1, 0, 0, "", .loaded )

Method.name: codeTS
Method.Description: return local timestamp of DFI document
Method.Implementation: Q ..ts( ..id )

Method.name: ts
Method.Implementation: s utcTS = ##class(%DeepSee.UserLibrary.FolderItem).timeModifiedGetStored( dfiid ) ;UTC timestamp s utc = $zdth(utcTS,3,,3) ;utc logical s local = $zdth(utc,-3) ; utc to local s ts = $zdt(local,3,,0) ; local timestamp Q ts

Method.name: List
Method.Implementation: s sql = "Select documentName as Name From %DeepSee_UserLibrary.FolderItem" s rs = ##class(%ResultSet).%New("%DynamicQuery:SQL") s sc = rs.Prepare( sql ) && rs.Execute( ) Q rs

Method.name: storage
Method.Implementation: Q "^sc"

Method.name: get
Method.Implementation: s storage = ..storage(), key = $g(key) Q:key="" $g(@storage, default) Q $g(@storage@(key), default)

Method.name: set
Method.Description: save settings - return settings value after save

Method.name: workdir
Method.Description: set or get working directory by default - current namespace database directory

Method.name: handlers
Method.Description: get or set handlers for event <var>handlers</var> - comma-separated value, for example: ("aftercompile") = "sc.handler,test.sctestrunner"
Method.Implementation:
Q:'$d(ext) ""
s storage = ..storage(), key = "ext"
s:$d(handlers) @storage@( key, ext ) = handlers ;set mode
s handlers = $g( @storage@( key, ext ) ) ;get mode
Q handlers

Method.name: printer
Method.Description: get or set classname for printer
Method.Implementation: s storage = ..storage(), key = "printer" s:$d(printer) @storage@(key) = printer Q $g(@storage@(key))

Method.name: init
Method.Implementation: d ..workdir( ..workdir() ) d ..handlers( "CLS", "sc.classes" ) d ..handlers( "MAC", "sc.routines" ) d ..handlers( "INT", "sc.routines" ) d ..handlers( "INC", "sc.routines" ) d ..handlers( "DFI", "sc.dfi" ) d ..printer( "sc.printer" ) Q 1

Method.name: dump
Method.Implementation: s storage = ..storage() zw @storage

Class.name: sc.plugin
Class.Description: [s]ource [c]ontrol plugin for InterSystems Cach√© (testing in v.2016.1) Just export or import to/from filesystem. Nothing more.

Parameter.name: Flags
Parameter.Description:
Just sync.
  • 1 : Present dialog on check in
  • 2 : Present dialog on check out
  • 3 : Ask to add new item to source control
  • 4 : Ask to remove deleted item from source control

Property.name: Modified
Property.Description:
Workaround for error in %Studio.AbstractDocument:SaveStream()+16 in Cache for Windows (x86-64) 2016.1 (Build 596U) Mon Nov 9 2015 21:12:55 EST
If the root node is set to 1 then calls to the source control hooks will keep track if the source control hook modifies the document and if it does then it will defined %SourceControl.Modified(docname)=1.

Method.name: OnBeforeLoad
Method.Description: Import the file from the external format into Cache. This is called before the actual load of data to give the chance to load the item from an external format.
Method.Implementation: s ..Modified = 0 ;workaround for error in %Studio.AbstractDocument:SaveStream()+16 Q ..on( "beforeload", code )

Method.name: OnAfterSave
Method.Implementation: Q ..on( "aftersave" , code )

Method.name: OnAfterCompile
Method.Description: Called when Studio compile code and some parts of code may be changed for example - storage scheme
Method.Implementation: Q ..on( "aftercompile", code ) ;only for additional export

Method.name: OnAfterDelete
Method.Implementation: Q ..on( "afterdelete", code )

Method.name: on
Method.Implementation: Q ##class(sc.classes).on( event, code )

Method.name: install
Method.Implementation:
s classname = ..%ClassName(1) ;legacy equivalent of $classname() d ##class(sc.legacy).sourceControlClass( classname )
d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "CLS", "sc.classes" ) d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "MAC", "sc.routines" ) d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "INT", "sc.routines" ) d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "INC", "sc.routines" ) d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "DFI", "sc.dfi" ) d ##class(sc.options).printer( "sc.printer" )
Q 1

Method.name: uninstall
Method.Implementation: d ##class(sc.legacy).sourceControlClass( "" ) Q 1

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Description: This callback method is invoked by the <METHOD>%New</METHOD> method to provide notification that a new instance of an object is being created.
Method.Implementation: s ..device = $g(device,$io) Q 1

Method.name: new
Method.Implementation:
s printer = ..%New($io)
s custom = ##class(options).printer()
Q:custom="" printer
s $zt = "newErr"
s printer = $zobjclassmethod( custom, "%New" )
Q printer
newErr s $zt = "", $ze = "" Q ..%New()

Method.name: w
Method.Implementation:
s io = $io
s status = "Ok!", err = "", elist = ""
if 'sc {
s status = "FAIL :( "
d ##class(%SYSTEM.Status).DecomposeStatus(sc, .elist)
s status = status _ $g(elist(1))
}
use ..device w !,"* ", msg, " ", status
use io

Method.name: error
Method.Implementation: d ..w(msg)

Method.name: filemask
Method.Implementation: Q "*.MAC.xml;*.INT.xml;*.INC.xml"

Method.name: exportAll
Method.Implementation:
s printer = ##class(sc.printer).new()
s handler = ..%New(), handler.event = "exportAll"
s result = 1, rs = ..List(.sc) Q:'sc sc
while rs.Next() {
s handler.code = $g(rs.Data("Name"))
if handler.ignore() continue
s sc = handler.export()
d printer.w( handler.code _ " -> " _ handler.filename(), sc )
d ##class(%SYSTEM.Status).AppendStatus( result, sc )
}
d rs.Close()
Q result

Method.name: List
Method.Implementation: s rs = ##class(%ResultSet).%New("%Routine:RoutineList") s sc = rs.Execute() Q rs

Method.name: ignore
Method.Implementation: Q:$e(..code)="%" 1 ;ignore system routines Q:##class(sc.legacy).codeIsGenerated(..code) 1 ;ignore generated code Q 0
